episodes.title: Blowing the lid off the Watchtower Organization part 1
episodes.description: You want facts, evidence, and real documentation proving the leaders of the WatchTower are misleading their followers. i am going to show you all the documentation I have in my long search for the truth concerning the WatchTower Society. I will show you what the leaders of the society wrote and how they tried to cover up their false teaching.  If I told you the JW Society quotes outside sources to prove they are teaching correctly but in their quoting they alter what was really said?  I will prove this to be true.  If you are a Jehovah Witness please understand I was never a JW. I only studied with them until they refused to answer some questions i had about the WatchTower teaching on Jesus Christ.  I am one of the many now who really can say I did make sure of all things!
